headline: AES Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.17595 per share payable on August 15, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on August 1, 2025.
